entity.name: Dr. Phil
entity.description: Dr. Phillip C. McGraw's show draws on his 25 years of experience in psychology, sociology and observation. Beginning his TV career as the resident expert on human behavior on Oprah Winfrey's daily talk show, Dr. Phil continues to deal with real issues in his blunt style.

text: @washingtonpost Dr. Oz and Dr. Phil are not experts on #coronavirus, but they like Dr. Drew, saw a chance to get publicity and acclaim from this. They are no better than the black market profiteers trying to make money off the backs of the victims. Shame on all of them.
